issue.title: Problem with SRS definition in metadata edition
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Following this ticket : https://forge.easysdi.org/issues/785.

Using other SRS than EPSG:4326 and EPSG:900913 in the metadata edition form raised a javascript error due to unknown SRS.
Regarding the analysis done in #785, we should replace the Proj4js 1.4.1 by the 1.1.0 version AND the openlayers library 2.12 by the 2.13 version.

With this done, we solve the inconsistent situation which was having 2 versions of those libraries in the project.

**Fixed versions :** 4.2.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Openlayers 2.12 is still used in components/com_easysdi_catalog/views/catalog/tmpl/default.php.
Must be replaced by the 2.13 version.
